mapper.sql: id, label, remarks, create_date, update_date, del_flag

insert into shanduo_label
id,
label,
remarks,
create_date,
update_date,
del_flag,

mapper.update:

remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update shanduo_label set label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, label from shanduo_label where del_flag = '0'
